Title: Relates to excess differential offsets for paraprofessionals employed by board of education
Summary: Provides that for each fiscal year commencing on or after July 1, 2025, the city of New York shall provide an excess differential offset to each person who was employed by the board of education as a paraprofessional for all or part of such year.
LawCode: Add ยง12-143, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to excess differential offsets for paraprofessionals employed by board of education
